outputs.output_descr: Increased capacity of key government partners and COs/UNCTs in participating countries to address specific content and process shortcomings of current or previous national development frameworks by using an HRBA and by drawing on experiences and methodologies from across different regions; documentation and dissemination of results and experiences of previous and new pilot countries of using an HRBA in the elaboration of national or sub-national development frameworks.

project_title: Operationalising an HRBA to Poverty Reduction - Phase II
